    # Install Digger CLI

    The dg command-line tool is one of the two primary ways to interact with Digger. The other is the Web UI at app.digger.dev (opens new window)

    # Homebrew

    brew install diggerhq/tap/dg

    # NPM

    npm install -g diggercli

    # Direct download

    curl -O https://digger-releases.s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/linux/dg-linux-v0.1.21.zip
unzip dg-linux-v0.1.21.zip
ln -s ./dg/dg /usr/local/bin/dg

    # Test that it works

    dg --version
